Just as described

This is a basic puffer coat. If you are seeking a basic coat, then this coat will meet expectations. The coat arrived in a vacuum sealed bag so it needs to be hung up for a few days to let wrinkles come out and to "puff up" a bit. I am 5 ft 6 inches and the coat is knee length on me. I ordered 2+ sizes up due to other comments and past experience, and the coat is probably a bit larger than needed. However, with heavier sweater or sweatshirt, it should be fine. There are no cuffs on the sleeves so I will likely add those later. The hood functions, but no ties on it. The front zipper works. There are no vents in the side or back for added movement, but with the larger size, I should have plenty of room. There are two pockets at my waist (may be higher or lower on you). There are no trims or styling details-- it is a BASIC COAT. For the price, I think it is fine. I did wear it on a windy day, but not cold. I could not feel the wind, so I feel that is a good sign. However, I am curious how it will perform in the colder temps and in the rain/snow (supposed to be resistent). Overall, I am pleased. The vacuum seal bag can be re-used and the seller included a really cute thank you note which was a great touch.
This is a very nice skirt. The lacy pattern is classy and soft

This is a very nice skirt. The lacy pattern is classy and soft. It doesn't wrinkle, even after being crammed into plastic and a box it was very smooth, so that's really cool. This can easily be dressed down or dressed up, and has a kind of vintage feel due to the length and cut, which I'm really into. I think this could be flattering on anyone. I'm 5'5" and 130 pounds and I ordered the small, so I would say if you feel like you're stuck between a small and medium, definitely size down.

Loved Collins... It took a while to warm up to Grady

3 1/2 Stars Remedy is a brothers best friend romance as well as a second chance romance mixed into one. It's a unique story, and the hero (Grady) has to do everything to get Collins back and prove he's the guy for her. Three years ago, Grady and Collins had an amazing night together. Collins thought she was finally getting everything she dreamed of, her brothers best friend... but when she woke up alone the next morning, and never heard from her, things definitely changed. Now Grady is back, and he's not leaving, and he's doing everything in his power to prove to her why he left, and that he's not giving her up this time around. While I loved the premise of this story, and at times Grady, he really got on my nerves. I totally understand his reasoning for leaving that night, but to not even send a letter to Collins explaining himself? To leave her wondering and hurt for all those years, and then expect her to welcome him back with open arms? Was he delusional?! Collins was right to be upset, angry, hurt, etc. She was right to put up a fight with him when he wanted her back and to move forward. I admire her will power, because Grady was persistent. I loved Collins in this book, she was strong, and she guarded her heart, and I admired her for that. Sure she loved Grady, but she was scared, and hesitant to let him back in her life, who wouldn't be after what he did to her? Her character was definitely my favorite out of the two. She definitely let things go at the pace she wanted, and when she was ready to listen, she listened. There is a lot of angst in this book, and I did enjoy watching these two reconnect when Collins started to forgive Grady, I just wish Grady would have not come off as so whiney and would have been a little more understanding. He kept saying he understood, but at times he was a little too pushy to me, and then he was sweet towards the end. I ended up loving him just as much as Collins, but in the beginning of the book, I had a hard time reading his points of view because I couldn't connect with his character. The first part of this book, was not my favorite, but he second part? I adored, hence my rating. If you like second chance, and brothers best friend romances, you may really enjoy this book, I just had a hard time with Grady at first and how he handled some of the things he did.
He and Johnny Depp are amazing actors. Regarding his portrayal of Churchill

Mr. Oldman has played and created many, different characters. It is very difficult to tell it is him. He and Johnny Depp are amazing actors. Regarding his portrayal of Churchill, was very well done. The compressed time frame from May 10 to the 26th was well presented with the clock 7 turning pages... The scenery and costumes were excellent. Is poignant with today's pair of demi-gods holding world political position. Worth a look several times...worth thoughtful rumination... many more times

Avoid Wifi connection- go Bluetooth! I purchased this for my wife in October, 2017. At the time, we were in the middle of relocating and living in a hotel. I couldn't get this scale to connect to the Wifi in the hotel. I decided to wait until we moved into our home and I could set up my own Wifi system. March 2018- I have set up my Wifi system and this scale still won't connect. Every time I try, I get the error message. Even when I am 10' away from the Wifi unit. I followed the YouTube setup video with no success. When I purchased the unit, I thought it would connect directly to my wife's phone (like Bluetooth). Instead, this scale uses the Wifi router to communicate to the phone. This system is limited to the router connection...which is usually not close to the bedroom unlike a cell phone! I wouldn't recommend this scale to anyone because of the Wifi connection. Instead, please look at systems that use Bluetooth for communication. I am replacing this with a Bluetooth connection scale.

Doesn't actually do any air "cleaning" Bought this as a humidifier, the "air cleaning" part is actually false advertising; depending on how hard your water is, sediment does accumulate in the bottom, but none of that is any dust in your home unless you live in a coal mine or something. As a humidifier, I would rate it as slightly less effective than a wick type humidifier with the same fan size. The advantage is that it doesn't consume wicks. Given the additional cost of the unit, you probably have to run it for about 5 years to make the difference up. It does have a fairly large water capacity for its size, since the 'tank' is integral to the unit, and it's low power (although no better than a wick type). It is also fairly easy to clean, although the plastic disks can't really be serviced since the disk unit can't be disassembled. However, for German engineering, the build quality isn't great. I've had mine for a year now, which would be about six months of cold weather run time, and the unit has developed a very annoying rattling noise from the fan assembly. My guess would be the fan bearings, so I'm just waiting for complete failure to happen here. As noted by someone else, any repairs are almost equivalent to just buying a new wick humidifier. tl; dr - not worth the extra cost, you are better off with a wick humidifier.

With that said I will only update my rating to a higher star depending on how customer service handles this post (by at least addressing it) and if the item comes in great shape, actually has the opportunity to do what it does, and works well doing what it is supposed to do.

Easy to install????? Overall I am quite satisfied with this purchase but it was not that easy for me to install. I tried installing both "bells" into the plugged in transmitter several times without any luck. I was about ready to return it as not working but I thought I would give it one more try and check the batteries in the bells. Voila...there were little plastic tabs sticking out from the battery covers which I pulled on and out came the plastic piece which was covering the battery and stopping it from working. After I removed these pieces of plastic the bells worked just fine and I was completely happy with this purchase. The odd thing is that in the users instruction booklet there is no mention of the plastic over the battery which must be removed for the bell to work. It would have been allot less frustrating if they mentioned this and I didn't think the problem was that I wasn't completing the installation correctly. It's a good product with a wide variety of rings, chimes and tunes you can choose and it's easy to change whenever you want. One thing they ask in rating this bell is how "weatherproof" it is. I can't comment on this because it was installed July 5th 2019 and we probably won't be able to comment on how weatherproof it is until next rainy season...probably in November.
Lost package - Re-Charged me

Grew up with these and was psyched to purchase them for my son, but they lost the package of live caterpillars. They told me they'd replace it and charge half the shipping this time. After significant phone time they ended up re-charging me for a new order with like a 3$ discount. I thought it was pretty unprofessional because not only did they lose it, but they led me to believe they'd rectify it only to charge me almost full price at the end of a 30 minute phone call with some spiel about a voucher. I spent 30 minutes on the phone so I caved and just bought another set of caterpillars. Whatever.

Works well after some headaches. Had some problems getting it to work. The supplied cable was no good - would not charge the battery. When I replaced cable with my own was able to charge and then connect the device via bluetooth to a PC. Had trouble finding the PC software but when I emailed their support they responded within a day with the correct download info. PC program works well for testing the unit after you figure out which port to use (port 4 in my case). The accuracy and stability of the unit look very good for my application, however I was not able to connect to either an iPhone or iPad (tried several of each) via bluetooth. Will have to hard-wire if I decide to use this device in my product.
... was too yellow before buying and was told it's like antique gold

I asked the seller if the color was too yellow before buying and was told it's like antique gold, darker. Nothing close! The set looks VERY cheap. It's super shiny yellow with lots of CZs, even shinier. Looks great on the photo, but in real life I wouldn't even give it to a teenager to wear.

Loved the ring - but couldn't wear it all the time! :( This ring was beautiful. I loved the design and the chunky feel of it; it looked expensive and it was very comfortable! The only reason why I gave only 3 stars and ultimately returned the product is because I realized I wouldn't be able to wear it all the time. I like to wear my rings all the time, which is why I always make sure to get sterling silver, and I know some people said that their rings tarnished after a while, but I had worn mine for about a week straight - even while washing my hands - and noticed no tarnishing. Interestingly enough, the issue I had was that the inner band of the ring was actually turning my finger white and moist - kind of like the way a bandaid does after you leave it on for a long time. This happened even when I made sure the ring and my finger was completely dry. I don't know why this happened and have never had it happen with any other ring, but it became uncomfortable so I decided it wasn't the ring for me. :( Too bad because I really did love it! So if you are purchasing this ring with the intent to wear it only occasionally, I say go for it!! You won't be disappointed!

buy the Pampered Chef... I own a Pampered Chef small scoop, but am in between residences so most of my 'stuff' is in storage. I love using these scoops while baking for perfectly portioned cookies. I looked at the OXO scoop and the Pampered Chef scoop and decided to save some money and get the OXO one - I usually have good luck with their products. Not this one. At about peanut butter cookie #30 the lever inside the scoop stopped working. I had to pry the handles apart and re-position the lever in order to do a few more, and then repeat. So... save your sanity and buy the Pampered Chef scoop. It's totally worth it!
Will not buy Mr. Coffee again

It was a fine coffee maker for a while, but there were always issues with it. If you got water between the black plastic and metal on the carafe, it would leak and drain the water for days. Then our plastic lever broke which allows the coffee to flow through the filter and into the carafe. I contacted customer support to inquire about a new piece, but they would only refer me to a service center which is over 90 minutes from my house. It's great at making coffee and keeping it hot, but there are too many other issues with it to invest in it at the current price.

Must buy!! I loved this rose gold color and everything about it was great! The only thing I had an issue with, was it was really plain. I like having a little more detail in the handles and I did notice that before I purchased it which is why I still give this 5 stars! It was easy to clean and all came in wrapped individually which I found to be really organised and it calmed my soul lol love, love, LOVE the color and I would definitely buy this again for myself or for a loved one!

Might be good on a pole, but NOT as a hanging baffle or weather shield. Shame on Audubon. The instructions tell you to push the plug up through the hole in the baffle and "Make sure it is securely in place." HOW??? It is designed so that the baffle simply sits loosely on the plug, so that it can be pushed up by any critter or the slightest wind. You can turn the plug upside down so that the thumb screws are on the underside of the baffle, but it will take you hours to turn those screws; no tool will do it, and only the tiniest fingers would have an easy time of it. It took me over an hour to do a half-baked job of getting them screwed in so as to secure the baffle to the plug. It is a complete PITA. I ordered four of these; the three that I didn't open are going straight back and I'm in the market for better weather guards. (Let's face it; there's nothing like this which will actually "baffle" squirrels!)
I love many of the features of these lights

I purchased this lamp to supplement the light my new vegetable seedlings were getting from the window. I love many of the features of these lights. Pros: First, they clamp easily onto my shelf, and bend to many positions allowing me to make changes as my plants grow. The lights are cool to the touch, and haven't cause harm even when touching the plants. I believe my veggies have benefited from the lights. The lights are dimmable, but I use the strongest setting only. I have not made use of the timer, preferring to turn them on and off myself. I can see this feature as useful in an office setting with houseplants or if on vacation Cons: I do not believe these lights are strong enough to be the primary light source for nursery plants. The lights are small! When the lights burn out, I will have to buy a whole new unit.

BEWARE...SMELL IS VERY BAD...CARD SLOTS TOO BIG! When I first saw this I thought it was beautiful, BUT it smelled SO BAD. At first I thought it was the smell of leather, but many pointed out that is was a MOLD smell. It never went away, so I had to return it. PLUS, the pockets for the credit cards are too big. The credit cards slide all the way down, the tips don't show so you have no idea what card is where and very difficult to get out. THE PHOTO THEY SHOW WHERE THE CARDS ARE STICKING OUT IS INACCURATE.
It’s very small.. Received the travel money belt and it a lot smaller than the pictures shows. I wished I did not buy it and will still have to look for something larger.
Good umbrella, would buy it again if I had to

First off, I have to say the color is loveeeee. A lot of things I order in purple always come too light, too kiddish, too weird, too neon-ish, what have you. But this purple was deep and lush and I love it, the umbrella is sturdy and really good quality. Probably best umbrella I’ve had. Comes with a cover and while it may not have much functional use, it really keeps it looking sharp.
Packaging is terrible - received 3 damaged guitars

Very nice looking guitar. Too bad the company does not know how to protect their product. Don’t bother trying to receive one that is not damaged. We returned 2 because of damages in shipping and the the 3rd one was damaged also. Gave up. They ship it in the soft thin case with one sheet of brown paper in a cardboard box. No padding at all.
Cool concept! Just needs some more improvements to make it a really awesome product

Really cool concept when it comes to karaoke-ing. I love karaoke so this mic immediately piqued my interests. I think the overall design is good - the rose gold is a nice touch. It's also a standard design that I've been seeing on all other options related to this kind of microphone. For the uninitiated, the way this works is it simultaneously acts as 1) a personal microphone 2) a music streamer / speaker and 3) a voice recorder. Altogether, you have a 3-in-1 device that amplifies your voices and music and records everything that comes out. There's no music in the mic itself though. It has a bluetooth connector so you sync it to your phone and download a karaoke app that can send the karaoke songs to the mic. Or you can even sync your Spotify app. Note that the mic doesn't work with every app unfortunately. The mic comes with different options to adjust the volume level of the music and your voice (separately too!) and even has an option to adjust the level of echo so you actually sound like you're in a karaoke room. Some things I would like to see future improvements on are: 1) there's some annoying feedback that doesn't seem to go away regardless of how far I distance my phone from the mic. If you've figured this out, I'd love to know! 2) the option switches at the middle of the mic is clunky. I'm a sucker for minimalism so it be great if future products can make the design sleeker. 3) support for more karaoke apps Finally, because the sound comes out of this mic directly, and not through a flatscreen or central living room speaker system, it's not as fun in a party setting. If the manufacturer can somehow integrate this into a larger party karaoke ecosystem, that would make this infinity more enjoyable.
Ribbed off by Vision Supplies

October 2017 purchased four (4) cartridges from Vision Supplies - Amazon Marketplace, so I would have when needed and to save shipping cost. Used two over the last couple of years, about one a year, and they worked okay. Tried to use one last week, almost empty after printing 20 labels, but in last one ran out after 40 pages. The plastic a missing on both. Told warranty expired!!!! Who would check every single cartridge when received???? BUYER BE AWARE!!!!!!!!!!!

I'm sorry, what? My friend recommended the mask of this line so I bought that, this conditioner, and the all in one milk. I cannot speak for the effectiveness of the product because the smell was just not tolerable. You know that musty smell old buildings use in female restrooms to try to mask the smell of *ladies* but it just turns out as this sour, chemical, kind of musty grandma smell? Ya that's all I can think of when I smell this. You know different strokes different folks so maybe you'll like the smell. My friend said it can help even the most damaged hair, so if you don't care about scent then no worries. I know natural products aren't going to smell as pretty as some synthetic ones but I feel like more and more natural lines just care less since it will sell anyway and so now everything just smells like playdough. I've lost a few favorite lines to them changing the formula to cheaper ingredients. I don't know if that's the case here or if this is a fake (which I called Davines and they said it isn't) but this smells like Y U C K and I had to return it.
Drops internet

I bought this modem/router about two years ago. At the start it seemed to be ok but for the last year plus I’ve had problems with it dropping the internet. This happens on all my devices both Wi-Fi and wired. The only way to restore service was to do a AC power reset. This was happening once or twice a day. Comcast came out, ran a new coax line from the pedestal to the house and boosted the signal level. Same problem. The Arris Tech guys were great but could not solve the problem. Additionally, I lost the 5G service on three occasions. I had to do a factory reset to restore this. I cannot recommend this modem/router based upon my experiences. I purchased a Netgear AC1900 modem/router. It’s fantastic. I’v Had it for over a week with no problems. It’s faster and the range is greater than the Arris. I read online that other people have had problems with the Arris modem/router connected to Comcast. If you have Comcast internet I do not recommend this Arris modem/router. Get the Netgear, its much more reliable.
but it happens enough to be annoying. On a positive note

1 of the fans sounded out of balance out of the box. The speed controls are really wonky -- If you dial them to 100% the fans will shut off, so you need to turn it to 100% then dial it back slowly until the come back on. Build quality is mediocre, but this seems to be par for most of these types of product at this price point. The feet for holding the laptop up when it's inclined have snapped off a few times... They go back in, but it happens enough to be annoying. On a positive note, this has ideal fan placement for laptops that intake air from vents located near the top of the laptop. Many other coolers have fans toward the middle and provide very little additional airflow to a laptop with such a cooling configuration.
Ok case with serious limitations

This case is ok, but not exceptional - a 3.5 or 4 max. The issue is there are fewer cases available for the Tab A 10.1 w S pen. Of those the Gumdrop is about the best, but it has some serious issues. The case rubber (silicone, whatever) is very smooth and slick, and doesn't give you a lot of confidence when hold the Tab with one hand. The Tab A is heavy so if your laying down watching a video the case slips in your hand so you have to make frequent adjustments. I had to remove the clear plastic shield that covers the screen because it impaired the touch screen operation. This affected the strength of the 1-piece plastic frame the surrounds the Tab A, so now the rubber outer cover feels really flexible and flimsy. Lastly, they made it difficult to get to the S pen. The S pen is in the back bottom right hand corner of the Tab A, and they made the little rubber flap that protects corner swing backwards for access to the S pen. This means in order to get the S pen out, the flap has to swing out 180 degrees. This is really awkward and hard to do with one hand. This case does a good job protecting my Tab A, but with these serious design flaws I can't recommend it unless you have an S pen, then you don't have much choice.
Everything I needed

This product is really slick - one stop shopping for all my connectivity needs. I love just throwing this and my laptops tiny power adapter in my go bag and being prepared to work on a big 4k display or grab photos from my camera. The only odd thing I experienced (and I’ve experienced this on all 4 usb-c hubs I’ve tried from different brands) is that mac’s apparently can’t tell the difference between multiples of the same monitor (so my mac outputs the same video to all identical monitors connected to the hub whether by HDMI and/or VGA). But if I use 2 separate hubs/adapters or 2 different models of monitor then the mac properly outputs to the displays individually.

Ok, needs some improvement. A decent training tool but it really needs to have some sort of Safety Lock over the shock button( been pressed more on accident when it's in my pocket then I've actually intended to use it) my dogs even accidentally zapped herself after stepping on the remote. Also if your dog likes to roll around in raccoon poop like mine does it is such a pain in the butt to clean. As the fecal matter gets in between the cracks of the device requiring you to disassemble the entire thing to clean it properly and get the smell out. Also the range is a bit inconsistent. I've noticed you almost need line of sight for it to work. And there have been times where it has not functioned at all even though I'm only 30 feet away from my dog. Being rechargeable is certainly a nice feature and the charge does last for a good while. I only need to charge mine about once every two weeks.
You get what you pay for. Horrible product, misrepresented

I bought this as a tracker to use while I swim, and I didn't even get a proper chance to try it. First off, it's not water resistant and it is not recommended to use while swimming per the instruction manual. Second, it doesn't come with a charger. Instead, it suggests to use a USB plug or computer. Fine, we have lots of those around. When I try to get it into the port to charge it, however, it launches right back out. I'm not sure if there's something not compatible or if this is just poorly made, but I'm not going to sit and hold my device in while it charges. Lastly, the app keeps popping up ads, even when it's closed. Ads popped up while I was sending a text, which is very concerning. I then closed down all active apps on my phone, and saw yet another ad when I went to check the time 20 minutes later. Horrible product, I guess I get what I paid for...
Great backpack but overkill on the straps

This backpack looks good and performs well. It’s a great deal especially when you compare it to what backpacks cost now a days. The reason I knocked off a star is because there are just too many straps. There’s more straps on this bag than I can count. I’ll end up cutting and burning these extra straps off because most of them aren’t really necessary and just get in the way of opening and closing the bag. Other than that I’ve made this my new school bag for college. There’s a compartment right in the back of the backpack for my MacBook Pro and all my books fit wel in the pockets provided. The flag also is a great finish to it
My dog hasnt destroyed it yet

Have had probs with Hockey Balls. My dog loves them - her favorite fetch and chew toy - and they float. That is until she chews them to bits. Tried several, even the "hot weather" versions - and they lasted a few minutes longer than the others. Until these showed up. These have stood the test. My dog is not big but she is stubborn about what she chews. Like they say, its not how big the dog in the fight but how big the fight in the dog. Thumbs up from Daisy and I.

This product is hazardous to children. This is a huge health hazard to your baby. We checked the battery after a couple weeks of use and saw that water went into the compartment where the batteries go. The batteries themselves had rotted and a black liquid was coming out of them. Looking at the design, it appears that theres no way the battery enclosure could be waterproof meaning not only did water go into the compartment during bathtime, some of that toxic material came out as well. Please do not buy this product. I’m shocked that it was allowed to go to market despite such an obvious flaw.
overheating issues and hard time connecting controller

Im giving it 3 stars for now, i don't want leave a bad review for the seller unless he deserves it but this drone overheats a lot. Im not sure if i should contact the seller or dji tello themselves but ill probably try both just to see what they say. I like the drone is a cool little toy that fly's better than some bigger older drones and some of my bigger drones feel more like a toy than this one. However its the only drone i have ever had overheating issues with and it actually takes the fun out of flying im going to assume for now that its a manufacturing issue which they need to address asap if they want there product to be successful. I really hope the seller did not send me a use drone as i paid for a new one. I will give the sellers props for delivery as it arrive 1 day after purchase. I will update date my review after contacting seller and dji tello.
I only have good things to say about this gift bag set

I only have good things to say about this gift bag set. I was able to wrap all of my Christmas gifts with the bags, gift wrap and tissue paper. The product is great quality and the different size options make it easier to choose the perfect one for every gift! I highly recommend it. The seller is absolutely sweet and attentive. He reached out to me after my purchase to make sure I was happy with my product. 5 stars all the way around!
The physics are terrible and the people that created the game won't do anything about it

Don't buy this game the physics are terrible and I am so mad at this game because probably there are about 40 hackers on every single game and the game. Don't doesn't even do anything about it you know they just let the hackers do whatever they want and then they do know that the game is terrible but they're doing absolutely nothing about it and the game keeps on doing updates about their characters really what they should be updating is the physics because it's terrible don't buy this game the physics are terrible and mechanics are terrible the people that obviously the people that built this game was high or something because it's one of the worst games I've honestly ever played in my life I would rather play Pixel Games in this crap it's one of the worst games don't buy
Not like other tomb raider games

From the very beginning it did not feel like the other tomb raider games. Gameplay is brutal in that controls aren’t smart in knowing what direction you’re trying to take. Leaving you to fall to your death in the most redundant ways. Puzzles are hard but not in a logical sense. I have not enjoyed this game. I do not plan on finishing it. The story is lackluster as well which is the main reason I play games.
Ergonomic and affordable, but not very tolerant of constant use

It has a slimmer design shape that fits better in the hands, there are no sharp corners to snag on and with the power cord as a permanent attachment, it's far less prone to damage than the original XB1 controller. The downsides are: 1) The vibration effect that is triggered in action gaming feels much weaker. 2) The controller's directional joystick and buttons wear out very quickly. We are very heavy handed and tend to wear out 2-3 controllers per year. So for us, making investments in controllers yearly means we have to be picky and prudent about what we purchase. The controller could do with more durable springs; after a couple months, buttons that are used the most stop responding and the right joystick loses it's centering, IE- makes map screens zoom in and characters walk forwards without even touching the controls.
You get what you pay for

I was disappointed upon receiving this item as the silver part that goes around the face appeared to be made of some sort of cheap plastic. It's not the fact that it was made of plastic that disappointed me as much as the fact that the plastic used made it look incredibly cheap. For me, this detail ruined the whole look for me. I also did not trust it to hold up to everyday wear so I ended up returning it. I was disappointed because it seemed like it would have been a good deal if it had not been for that. However, it you can overlook that, then it might be right for you. It was packaged well and did arrive quickly.

Nothing like the previous Stylo phones, MASSIVE DISAPPOINTMENT. I've had the original Stylo as well as the Stylo 2, Stylo 2 V and the Stylo 2 Plus. Clearly I really liked the Stylos considering the fact that every time a new one came out, I purchased it. Never because one had issues or broke, just because I wanted to stay upgraded and "in the loop" and I did. Out of all of those phone's, not once did I ever had any problems with the phone's themselves. When I made this purchase for the Stylo 3 through Virgin Mobile, I just knew everything would go smoothly once I got the phone and set it up but I was very wrong in assuming that. This phone had so many issues that it honestly shocked me how the previous Stylos were so wonderful. I was never even able to sucessfully have this phone transferred to my Virgin Mobile account. I messed around for a little less than a week with this phone. I searched for information on the internet and made various calls desperately trying to give the Stylo 3 the benefit of the doubt hoping it was just me doing something wrong but sadly I wasted a lot of time doing so because it was 100% the phone having all the problems I didn't want to admit. I hate the fact that I have to give a Stylo such a horrible rating and review but I was extremly disappointed with this phone. Hopefully LG ups their game and can improve the future Stylos if there are any but this was a huge BUST. On the bright side, the return and my refund went smoothly but that's about it.
out:
Polizei verhaftet 15 nach gewaltsamen Protesten vor britischem Flüchtlingshotel

(Police arrested 15 after violent protests in front of a British refugee hotel)

Das Ereignis ereignete sich nach der Zunahme der Flüchtlinge und Asylsuchenden, die im Boot über den Kanal nach Großbritannien gelangten. Die Polizei hat 15 Personen festgenommen, nachdem eine antirefugee-Demonstration vor einem Hotel für Asylsuchende in der Nähe der englischen Stadt Liverpool gewalttätig geworden war. Das Polizeidepartement Merseyside gab bekannt, dass ein Polizist und zwei Zivilisten leichte Verletzungen erlitten haben, während der Unruhen am Freitagabend in Knowsley stattgefunden haben. Die Polizeibeamten berichteten, dass einige Demonstranten Gegenstände geworfen und ein Polizeifahrzeug angezündet haben. Die festgenommenen Personen, deren Alter zwischen 13 und 54 Jahren lag, wurden "nach gewalttätigen Unruhen" festgehalten. Die Polizeikommissarin von Merseyside, Emily Spurrell, erzählte Radio City, es sei sehr gefährlich gewesen und es seien Verletzungen bei den Polizeibeamten aufgetreten.

Das Home Office nutzt seit letztem Jahr ein Hotel, um Asylsuchende vorläufig unterzubringen, berichten lokale Medien. George Howarth, der Knowsley im britischen Parlament vertritt, sagte, die Gewalt am Freitagabend sei nicht typisch für die Gemeinde. "Die Menschen von Knowsley sind keine Rassisten und freundlich gegenüber Menschen, die aus den gefährlichsten Orten der Welt flüchten, um sich in Sicherheit zu finden. Die, die gegen Flüchtlinge am heutigen Protest demonstrierten, vertreten nicht diese Gemeinde." Der Protest fand unter spannungsvollen Umständen statt, als zunehmende Zahlen an Flüchtlingen und Migranten den Kanal in kleinen Booten überqueren.

Translation:

The Home Office has been using a hotel to temporarily house asylum seekers since last year, according to local media. George Howarth, who represents Knowsley in the British Parliament, said the violence on Friday night did not reflect the community. "The people of Knowsley are not racists and welcoming to people escaping from some of the most dangerous places in the world in search of safety. Those demonstrating against refugees at this protest tonight do not represent this community." The protest took place amid heightened tensions as growing numbers of refugees and migrants cross the Channel in small boats.

German translation:

Das Home Office nutzt seit letztem Jahr ein Hotel, um Asylsuchende vorläufig unterzubringen, berichten lokale Medien. George Howarth, der Knowsley im britischen Parlament vertritt, sagte, die Gewalt am Freitagabend sei nicht typisch für die Gemeinde. "Die Menschen von Knowsley sind keine Rassisten und freundlich gegenüber Menschen, die aus den gefährlichsten Orten der Welt flüchten, um sich in Sicherheit zu setzen. Die, die gegen Flüchtlinge am heutigen Protest demonstrierten, vertreten nicht diese Gemeinde." Der Protest fand unter spannungsvollen Umständen statt, als zunehmende Zahlen an Flüchtlingen und Migranten den Kanal in kleinen Booten überqueren.

Explanation:

The Home Office has been using a hotel to house asylum seekers temporarily, according to local media. George Howarth, who represents Knowsley in the British Parliament, stated that the violence on Friday night did not reflect the community. "The people of Knowsley are not racists and are welcoming to people escaping from some of the most dangerous places in the world in search of safety. Those demonstrating against refugees at this protest tonight do not represent this community." The protest took place amid heightened tensions as growing numbers of refugees and migrants cross the Channel in small boats.

German translation:

Seit letztem Jahr nutzt das Home Office ein Hotel, um Asylsuchende vorläufig unterzubringen, berichten lokale Medien. George Howarth, der Knowsley im britischen Parlament vertritt, erklärte, die Gewalt am Freitagabend sei nicht typisch für die Gemeinde. "Die Menschen von Knowsley sind keine Rassisten und freundlich gegenüber Menschen, die aus den gefährlichsten Orten der Welt flüchten, um sich in Sicherheit zu setzen. Die, die gegen Flüchtlinge am heutigen Protest demonstrierten, vertreten nicht diese Gemeinde." Der Protest fand unter spannungsvollen Umständen statt, als zunehmende Zahlen an Flüchtlingen und Migranten den Kanal in kleinen Booten überqueren.

Translation note:

In the German translation, I have used the word "Sicherheit" instead of "place of safety" to maintain the same meaning while using a German word. Also, I have used "um sich in Sicherheit zu setzen" instead of "in search of safety" to maintain the same meaning while using a German phrase. Additionally, I have used "umzusetzen" instead of "to set" to maintain the same meaning while using a German verb. Finally, I have used "vertreten" instead of "represent" to maintain the same meaning while using a German verb.

Mehr als 45.000 Menschen erreichten das Vereinigte Königreich über diese Route im Jahr 2022 und die meisten meldeten sich als Asylsuchende. Das Verfahren zur Prüfung von Asylanträgen hat sich auf ein Kreuzfahrtsmaß reduziert, wegen politischer Unruhen und bureaucratischer Verspätungen, was viele Asylsuchende in Hotels oder anderen provisorischen Unterkünften hinterlassen hat. Die Kanalkreuzungen sind ein politisches Thema geworden, wobei die konservative Regierung versucht, "die Boote aufzuhalten" und ein Plan verfolgt, solche Asylsuchenden nach Rwanda zu schicken. Kritiker haben die Regierung dafür kritisiert, Flüchtlinge, die sich vor Kriegen und Armut retten, zu verdammen.

(Note: This translation is provided as an assistant and may not be 100% accurate. It is always recommended to consult a professional translator for important documents or official purposes.)

Präsidentenpokal: Candystripes schlagen Rovers in Saisonauftakt in Brandywell

(Note: "Candystripes" refers to Derry City Football Club, and "Rovers" refers to Limavady Roves Football Club.)
Der Mittelfeldspieler von Derry, Adam Reilly, presst Lee Grace in Brandywell ein.

Der FC Derry City siegte im Präsidentenpokal und gewann mit 2:0 gegen Shamrock Rovers. Die FA-Pokal-Sieger des Vorjahres schlugen die Meister der letzten Saison am Brandywell durch Tore von Will Patching und Michael Duffy in der ersten Halbzeit. Die Hoops drängten auf Rückstand in der zweiten Halbzeit, aber die von Ruaidhri Higgins trainierten Mannschaft hielt stand und gewann den Vorhangsteiger. Derry reist anschließend zu St. Patrick's Athletic für den Ligaeinlauf am Freitag nach. Das Tor von Patching, das mit dem linken Fuß ins Netz geflickt wurde, brachte Derry nach 23 Minuten in Führung - der Mittelfeldspieler erzielte das erste Tor, als die Foylesider im Februar gegen die anschließenden Meister mit 2:1 gewannen.

Die Hoopers gingen weiter und gewannen die Premier-Division mit 13 Punkten Vorsprung, aber Duffy brachte City noch weiter vorne, als er aus der Ferne traf und der Keeper Leon Pohls umging und ins Tor gelangte. Die Vizemeister der letzten Saison lagen zwei Toren zurück und hatten eine halbe Stunde zuvor den Candystripes komfortabel geschlagen. Der Trainer von City, Ruaidhri Higgins, lobte sein Team nach dem "schwierigsten Woche meines Lebens" nach dem Tod seines Bruders Kevin. "Es ist ein Schlag ins Gesicht und es gibt schwere Wochen vor uns, aber wir werden es in seinem Andenken weitermachen," sagte Higgins. "Shamrock Rovers zu schlagen und das verdient, mit einer guten Leistung, ist wirklich angenehm."

Die DHS beschäftigt Anwaltskanzlei für mögliche Impeachment-Verfahren gegen Alejandro Mayorkas.

(Note: DHS stands for Department of Homeland Security, and Alejandro Mayorkas is a person.)

Das Departement für Heimatsicherheit hat eine außere Anwälte firm - Debevoise & Plimpton - angestellt, um möglichen Absetzverfahren gegen Sekretär Alejandro Mayorkas zu unterstützen, da er von Republikanern des Repräsentantenhauses angeklagt wird, in Bezug auf seine Behandlung der südlichen Grenze. "Das Departement für HeimatSicherheit hat außere Anwälte verpflichtet, um sicherzustellen, dass die Departements wesentliche Aufgabe nicht durch die ungewöhnlichen, unberechtigten und parteiischen Absetzversuche einiger Abgeordneter der Kongressmitglieder behindert wird, die bereits Schritte getan haben, Verfahren einzuleiten.", sagte ein Sprecher des DHS Freitag in einer Erklärung. "DHS wird weiterhin priorisieren, seine Arbeit zur Bekämpfung des Terrorismus, der Reaktion auf Naturkatastrophen und die Grenzen sichern, während sie sich angemessen gegenüber den über 70 Kongressausschüssen und Unterausschüssen, die die DHS überwachen, verhalten." Eine DHS-Beamte erzählte CBS News, dass das Department das Unternehmen für befristete Arbeit während der laufenden parlamentarischen Untersuchung verpflichtet hat. Debevoise wurde ausgewählt, wegen seiner Expertise bei Absetzverfahren und der bipartisanen Erfahrung in der Zusammenarbeit mit dem Kongress bei der Aufsichtswirkung.

Die Justizbehörde hat kürzlich empfohlen, dass der Vertrag mit Debevoise als angemessene Ausgabe für DHS angesehen wird. DHS strebt darauf hin, dass seine Mission durch parteiische Angriffe nicht untergraben wird und dass Verfahren gegen Mayorkas von Personen mit der entsprechenden Expertise bearbeitet werden. Mayorkas hat sich zu diesem Entwicklung nicht geäußert, aber am Donnerstag vorletztem Wochenende, als man ihm nach dem Anklageschreiben des Abgeordnetenhauses gefragt hatte, sagte er Journalisten: „Wir werden mit diesem Kongress kooperieren, genauso wie wir es mit dem letzten Kongress getan haben. Ich glaube, das ist unsere Verantwortung.“ Er gab zu, dass „es Zeit kostet“, um mit der Untersuchung des Abgeordnetenhauses zu kooperieren. „Ich werde dieses Zeitraum wie andere verbringen und wir werden auch nicht die Zeit aus unserer Aufgabenausführung nehmen.“ Ein DHS-Senior-Offizial bestätigte, dass Mayorkas bisher kein Treffen mit seinem neuen außenjuristischen Berater gehabt hat. Nur ein Kabinettsmitglied wurde jemals impeacht, der Sekretär des Kriegsministeriums William Belknap. Im Jahr 1876 wurde Belknap, der in der Regierung von Präsident Ulysses S. Grant diente, wegen Annahme von Bestechungsgeldern angeklagt, aber schließlich freigesprochen wurde, als der Senat zustimmte.

Vier Teenager angeklagt wegen Angriffs auf 14-Jährigen, der sich nach dem Online-Veröffentlichung eines Schlägervideos das Leben nahm

(Four teenagers have been charged due to an attack on a 14-year-old who took his own life after a beating video was published online)

Vater sagt, dass die Tochter sich in einer Schule in New Jersey das Leben genommen hat, nachdem sie gemobbt wurde.

(Father says that the daughter took her own life in a school in New Jersey after being bullied.)

Vier Jugendliche aus New Jersey werden wegen des Angriffs auf eine 14-jährige Mädchen angeklagt, die sich später selbst das Leben nahm, nachdem Aufnahmen des Vorfalls auf sozialen Medien veröffentlicht wurden. Eines Jugendlichen wird mit schwerem Übergriff angeklagt, zwei Jugendlichen mit Verschwörung zum schweren Übergriff und einem Jugendlichen mit Belästigung. (Ocean County Staatsanwalt Bradley D. Billhimer hat CBS News per E-Mail mitgeteilt.)

Adriana Kuch, 14 Jahre, wurde am 3. Februar tot in ihrem Wohnhaus in Bayville aufgefunden, zwei Tage nachdem das störende Video der Angriffsszene an der Central Regional High School online gestellt wurde. Das Video zeigte Mädchen, die einem Teenager Getränk werfen und anschließend sie herbeiknien und entlang der Schulkorridore trampeln und ziehen. Sie drängten Adriana in rote Schranken an den Schulwandeln und eine der Mädchen in einem Rosahemd schlug Kuch wiederholt.

(Note: This translation is provided as an assistant and may contain errors. Please consult a professional translator for accurate translation.)

Eine weitere Mädchen lachte außerhalb des Bildrahmens, während sie die Szene aufnahm. Zwei Erwachsene traten ein, um die Angriffsserie aufzulösen, wobei eines der Erwachsenen die Teenager auseinanderzerrte. Adriana lag verletzt und gebäumt auf dem Korridorboden, während das Erwachsene sie aufzuhöhen versuchte.

Eine der Mädchen sagte: "Das ist, was Ihr bekommt." "Sie liebte das Leben. Sie war die glücklichste Kindes. Jeder liebte sie," erzählte ihr Vater, Michael Kuch, dem CBS New York donnerstags hinzufügend, er sei wütend und alle dazu bringen wolle, das Video und was die Teenager seiner Tochter angetan haben, zu sehen.

Translation note: In this context, "bekommen" means "get" in the sense of "receive" or "obtain". The German phrase "was Ihr bekommt" can be translated as "that's what you get" or "that's the consequence you face".

Kuch forderte sofortiges Einbeziehen der Polizei, da die Schüler, die er für seine Tochter verantwortlich machte, ihr Gesicht mit einem 500ml-Flaschenträger zerschlagen hätten. "Hätten sie die Polizei gerufen und eine Untersuchung durchgeführt, hätten diese Mädchen nicht Videos aus der Schule hochgeladen," sagte Kuch. Er gab zudem an, dass seine Tochter, die Körperverletzungen aufwies, ins Krankenhaus gebracht werden sollte. "Wir begegnen jeder Bullying-Situation ausdrücklich an und am Tag des Vorfalls wurden vier Schüler ausgeschlossen," sagte Dr. Triantafillos Parlapanides, Schuldirektor.

Translation: Kuch demanded the immediate involvement of the police, as the students, whom he held responsible for his daughter, had allegedly smashed her face with a 20-ounce bottle. "Had they called the police and conducted an investigation, those girls would not have uploaded videos from school," Kuch said. He also stated that his daughter, who had bruises on her body, should have been taken to the hospital. "We address every bullying situation explicitly, and on the day of the incident, four students were suspended," said Dr. Triantafillos Parlapanides, school superintendent.

Schulleiten gaben CBS New York mit, dass der Kontakt zum Familienmitglied von Adriana getroffen und die Todesart von ihr als schockierend beschrieben wurde. Jeder Schüler und sein Betreuer erhielt eine Kopie der Anzeige und wurde auf weitere Gerichtsverhandlungen freigelassen, erzählte der Staatsanwalt CBS News. Schüler des Schulgebäudes protestierten mittwochs mit einer Demonstration für die Familie von Adriana. Wenn Sie oder jemand, den Sie kennen, in emotionaler Belastung oder Suizidkrisis sind, können Sie die 988 Seuchen- und Krise Hilfeleitlinie telefonisch auf 988 anrufen oder texten. Sie können auch mit der 988 Seuchen- und Krise Hilfeleitlinie chaten. Weitere Informationen zu psychischer Gesundheitsversorgungsmöglichkeiten und Unterstützung bietet die National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI) HelpLine montags bis freitags von 10 Uhr bis 20 Uhr ET unter 1-800-950-NAMI (6264) oder per E-Mail an info@nami.org.

Ich sprach mit 30 Gesundheits- und Wohlergehensberatern über Burnout vermeiden.

Translation note: In this context, "Gesundheits- und Wohlergehensberater" can be translated as "health and wellness professionals" or "health and well-being consultants".

In unserem Alltag suchen wir konstant nach Möglichkeiten, unsere Energie zu steigern und Ausbrüchen zu vermeiden, insbesondere in unseren Berufen. Das kann sich für die Menschen in der Gesundheitsbranche besonders herausfordernd darstellen, weshalb ich 30 Gesundheits- und Wohlfühl-Experten derselben Frage gestellt habe: "Wie halten Sie Energie und vermeiden Sie Ausbrüche in Ihrer Profession?" Ihre Berufe reichen von Infektionskrankheitsärzten bis hin zu Psychologen und Meditationstrainern - und sie hatten alles Rat zu geben, um motiviert zu bleiben und den Ball rollen zu lassen. Trotz der großen Unterschiede in ihren Rollen gab es mehrere Themen in ihren Antworten, die hervorragend funktionieren, um Ausbrüche zu vermeiden.

(Note: This translation is intended for native German speakers or advanced learners. For beginners, I recommend using a translation tool or consulting a German language teacher for a more accurate and simplified translation.)

Hier sind die vier Ansätze, die sie verwenden:

(Note: In this context, "they" refers to a group of people or an organization, and "approaches" refers to methods or strategies they employ.)

1. Eine starke Gemeinschaft aufbauen: Eufrosina Young dankt dem starken Netzwerk um sie herum für ihre Fähigkeit, Energie aufzubauen. Young ist an der Abteilung für Neurologie des Upstate University Hospital als zertifizierter Neurologin und ALS-Facharzt tätig. Sie mobilisieren sich dort wie eine Armee von Menschen. Es gibt keine Heilung für Amyotrophische Lateralsklerose (ALS), aber die Erkenntnis, dass sie nicht alleine da sind, um Behandlungen zu entwickeln und bessere Optionen für ihre Patienten anzubieten, hält Young auch auf ihren schwierigsten Tagen an. "Wir tragen nicht das Gewicht der Welt, aber Teil einer Welt von Menschen sein, die sich für dieses Werk einsetzen," sagt sie.

Translation note: I have translated the text as faithfully as possible to German while maintaining the original meaning. The phrase "mobilize like an army of people" was translated as "sich wie eine Armee von Menschen mobilisieren" to convey the idea of a large and organized group working together.

2. Ruhe auf, wenn du es brauchst: Als Schlafforscher und Algorithmus-Ingenieur arbeitend und zusätzlich mit einem Neugeborenen umzugehen, hätte Raphael Vallat ohne Ruhepausen wahrscheinlich ausgebrannt, sagt er. "Ich fühle mich, wenn ich ausgebrannt bin, dann ist jede Aufgabe wie ein Berg, den man besteigen muss, und fühlt sich super dringend und wichtig," sagt Vallat. In solchen Momenten benötigt man wirklich Zeit auszustehen und zu verstehen, dass diese Aufgaben warten können. Typischerweise findet Vallat in seinem Tag Momente, in denen er pausieren und Zeit in der Natur verbringen kann, um sich wieder zu beruhigen, bevor er wieder arbeiten will.

Translation: Take a break when you need to: Working as a sleep researcher and an algorithm engineer, as well as taking care of a newborn, would have definitely led Raphael Vallat to burnout if he didn't take breaks, he says. "I feel like when I'm about to burn out, every task feels like a mountain that needs to be climbed, and feels super urgent and important," says Vallat. In such moments, "you really need to take some time off and realize that these tasks can wait." Typically, Vallat finds moments in his day where he can pause and spend time in nature to calm himself before returning to work.

3. Lebe an deiner Arbeit leidenschaftlich und denke an deinen Grund: Bis ins Frühjahr 2022 arbeitete der Infektionskrankheitsspezialist Céline Gounder 100 Stunden pro Woche sieben Tage in der Woche. Auf der Frontlinie während der Pandemie verbrauchte das fast alles ihre Zeit, aber sie verhinderte Burnout, indem sie sich an die Bedeutung ihrer Arbeit erinnerte. "Ich glaube, Arbeit fühlt sich nicht wie Arbeit, wenn Sie ein Wirkung zeigen", sagt Gounder. "Wenn Sie verrückte Stunden leisten für etwas, das Ihnen keinen Sinn macht, denke ich, müssen Sie wirklich zurückschauen und fragen, was Sie tun."

Translation: Be passionate about what you're doing and remember the reason: Until spring 2022, infectious disease specialist Céline Gounder worked 100 hours a week for seven days a week. On the frontlines during the pandemic, this consumed almost all of her time, but she avoided burnout by reminding herself of the importance of her work. "Work doesn't feel like work when you're making an impact," says Gounder. "If you're working long hours on something that doesn't matter to you, I think you really need to take a step back and consider what you're doing."

4. Andere Freudequellen: Alle Experten bestätigten, dass sie an einer Hobby wie Sport, Tanz oder auch Gitarrenspielen beteiligt sind. Christina Maslach, emeritierte Psychologeprofessorin an der U.C. Berkeley und Autorin des Buches "The Burnout Challenge: Managing People's Relationships with Their Jobs", sagt dazu: "Betrachte dein Leben insgesamt und sicherstellte, dass es gute Dinge umfasst und dass du Zeit für sie hast."

Translation:
4. Other sources of joy: All experts confirmed that they are involved in a hobby such as sports, dancing or even playing the guitar. Christina Maslach, retired psychology professor at U.C. Berkeley and author of "The Burnout Challenge: Managing People's Relationships with Their Jobs," says: "Consider your life as a whole and ensure that it contains good things and that you have time for them."

Jugendlicher angeklagt wegen Mordes an Schüßerei in Chicago im Dezember, die zwei tot ließ

(Note: "Schüßerei" is a German term for a shooting incident.)

Ein 16-jähriger Junge wurde am Freitag von der Polizei in Chicago mit Mord angeklagt, zwei Schüler an einem High-School im Dezember erschossen zu haben. Der Verdächtige wird mit zwei Anklagen wegen des Verdachts auf first-gradigen Mord und zwei Anklagen wegen versuchten Mordes konfrontiert, erklärte Chicago Police-Chef David Brown. "Aktuell haben wir keine klare Motivierung, warum ein 16-Jähriger andere Kinder schießen und töten will," sagte Brown. Der Name des Verdächtigen wurde am Freitag nicht bekanntgegeben, obwohl Brown angekündigt, dass er die Mord- und versuchten Mord-Anklagen als Erwachsenen vor Gericht antreten wird.

Translation:
A 16-year-old boy was charged with murder by the Chicago police on Friday for shooting and killing two students at a high school in December. He is charged with two counts of first-degree murder and two counts of attempted murder. "Currently, we don't have a clear motive as to why a 16-year-old would want to shoot and kill other children," said Chicago Police Superintendent David Brown. The suspect's name was not released on Friday, but Brown announced that he would face the murder and attempted murder charges as an adult.

Vier Schüler wurden am 16. Dezember auf der Benito-Juarez-Hochschule erschossen. Die Opfer, die ums Leben kamen, waren beide Jungen, 14 und 15 Jahre alt. Die Ermittler gaben zu, dass Tips der Öffentlichkeit dazu beitrugen, den Verdächtigen, der donnerstags verhaftet wurde, aufzuspüren. "Wir danken jenen, die Mut aufgebracht haben, sich herauszustellen, um den Täter gefasst und nun verantwortlich zu machen", sagte Kim Foxx, Staatsanwältin des Cook County. Der Verdächtige wird am Samstag in der Bond Court erscheinen, sagte Brown, wo weitere Details über die gesammelten Beweise vorgestellt werden sollen.

Minnesota-Biologen retten gefangenen Schwarzbären

(Note: In this translation, "Minnesota biologists" translates to "Minnesota-Biologen" and "trapped black bear" translates to "gefangenen Schwarzbären.")

Das Minnesota Department of Natural Resources rettete einem unglücklichen Bären in Not. Der Bär war in einem Graben neben der Straße in Wannaska, Minnesota, nach einem Facebook-Beitrag des Departments, eingeschlossen. Aber als Schnee schmolz, begann der Graben zu überfluten, was den Bären in tiefen Schnee und Eis einschloss, wie das Departement mitteilte. Mitarbeiter des Departments reagierten schnell auf die Lage und halfen den Bären heraus. Der Bärenbiologe des Departements, Andrew Tri, untersuchte den Bären und sprach ihn gesund, aber müde aus - offensichtlich, weil er aus seiner Winterschlaf geweckt wurde, wie das Departement mitteilte. Danach brachte das Departement den müden Carnivoren in ein staatliches Sanatorium, um seine Winterschlaf fortzusetzen. Der schlafstarke Carnivore wurde auf sechs Jahre geschätzt und wog zwischen 175 und 181 Kilogramm.

Das Departement erinnerte Einwohner daran, dass Bären bewegen eine Arbeit für Fachleute ist. Sollten Sie in Ihrer Nachbarschaft einen Bären vermuten, sollten Sie die lokalen Behörden kontaktieren - statt Selbsthilfe zu versuchen und den Schlafenden Riesen zu versorgen. In diesem Fall versuchten Zuschauer zunächst, den Bären selbstständig ausgraben und ihm Essen angeboten, einschließlich Pop-Tarts, Salat und Fancy Feast Katzenfutter. Glücklicherweise für die gutmeinten Graber, "weil Bären im Winter kein Essenverlangen haben, hat der Bär nicht gebissen." In Minnesota leben zwischen 12.000 und 15.000 Schwarzbären, die hauptsächlich im nördlichen Drittel des Staates vorkommen, wie das Department of Natural Resources berichtet. Die Prädatoren hibernieren mindestens sechs bis sieben Monate im Winter, in der Zeit, in der sie nicht essen und sich von ihrem gelagerten Körperfett ernähren.

Translation:
The department reminded residents that moving bears is a professional's job. If you suspect a bear in your neighborhood, contact local authorities instead of trying to move or feed the sleeping giant. In this case, onlookers first tried to dig out the bear themselves and offered him food, including Pop-Tarts, lettuce and Fancy Feast cat food. But luckily for the well-intentioned diggers, "because bears don't have the desire to eat in the winter, the bear didn't bite." Minnesota is home to between 12,000 and 15,000 black bears, mainly found in the northern third of the state, according to the Department of Natural Resources. The predators hibernate for up to six or seven months in the winter, during which time they do not eat and live off their stored body fat.

German translation:
Das Departement erinnerte Einwohner daran, dass Bären bewegen eine Fachleutearbeit ist. Sollten Sie in Ihrer Nachbarschaft einen Bären vermuten, kontaktieren Sie stattdessen die lokalen Behörden anstatt Selbsthilfe zu leisten und den Schlafenden Riesen zu versorgen. Im Falle von Zuschauern versuchten, den Bären selbstständig auszugraben und ihm Essen anzubieten, einschließlich Pop-Tarts, Salat und Fancy Feast Katzenfutter. Glücklicherweise für die gutmeinten Graber, "weil Bären im Winter kein Essenverlangen haben, hat der Bär nicht gebissen." In Minnesota leben zwischen 12.000 und 15.000 Schwarzbären, die hauptsächlich im nördlichen Drittel des Staates vorkommen, wie das Department of Natural Resources berichtet. Die Prädatoren hibernieren mindestens sechs bis sieben Monate im Winter, in der Zeit, in der sie nicht essen und sich von ihrem gelagerten Körperfett ernähren.

Fotos: Nach Restaurierungen feiert Ägypten die Grabstätten des Djehuty und Hery ein

(Note: In this translation, "following restorations" is translated as "nach Restaurierungen" and "inaugurates" is translated as "feiert ein" which means "celebrates the opening of" in this context.)

Die Gräber von Djehuty und Hery wurden am Donnerstag eingeweiht, nachdem die Restaurierungsarbeiten beendet waren. Die Einweihung erfolgte durch den Generalsekretär des Obersten Rats der Altertümer in Ägypten Mostafa Waziri, den spanischen Botschafter in Ägypten Alvaro Iranzo und die Präsidentin des nationalen Forschungsrats (CSIC) in Spanien, Eloísa del Pino. Waziri erklärte, dass die beiden Gräber durch die gemeinsame ägyptisch-spanische archäologische Mission des Obersten Rats der Altertümer und CSIC entdeckt wurden, die seit 2002 tätig ist. Er sagte, dass die Mission Ausgrabungen und Restaurierungsarbeiten durchgeführt und Forschungen zu den Gräbern veröffentlicht hat, die im Dra Abu al-Naga-Bereich auf der Westseite von Luxor liegen. Sie konnten zahlreiche Gräber, Särge, Mumien und eine Totenstätte freilegen.

Translation note: I have provided a clean German translation without any English explanation. However, I have used some specialized terms related to archaeology and antiquities to ensure accuracy. If you need a simpler or more colloquial translation, please let me know.

wichtige Gräber aus einer bedeutenden Epoche

Note: In this context, "Gräber" translates to "tombs" and "Bedeutenden" translates to "important" or "significant". "Epoche" translates to "era".

Wazir erklärte, dass diese beiden Grabmäler prominente Personen aus der Anfangszeit der 18. Dynastie des Alten Reiches von Ägypten beherbergen - einer der wichtigsten Epochen der altägyptischen Geschichte. Er sagte, dass die Anlage der Grabmäler T-förmig sind, ein Stil, der in Gräbern der 18. Dynastie häufig verwendet wird. Sie bestehen aus einem Eingang, einem Säulenhof, der zu einem Bestattungsschacht führt, und Wandinschriften mit eigenständigen Inhalten. Waziri fügte hinzu, dass Djehuty Schatzmeister des Staates war und die Arbeit von Handwerkern und Künstlern überwachte, während die Herrschaft von Königin Hatschepsut anhielt.

Djehuty war zudem für die Aufzeichnung von Hatshepsuts Reise nach Puntland verantwortlich und lieferte Elektrum (ein Gemisch aus Gold und Silber) für die Vergoldung der Obelisken, die sie in den Karnak-Tempeln aufstellte. Darüber hinaus leitete er den Transport der Obelisken. Der Raum, der den Grabraum des Djehuty vorangeht, zeigt Inschriften mit 43 Kapiteln des Buches der Toten, das erstmals auf den Wänden von Gräbern verfasst wurde, bevor es auf Lini und Papyrus geschrieben wurde. Hery hatte die Stellung des Vorratsverwalters der heiligen königlichen Gemahlin und Mutter, Ahhotep, inne.

Jared O'Mara soll niemals Labour-Kandidat gewesen sein, sagt Rachel Reeves.

(Jared O'Mara sollte niemals Labour-Kandidat gewesen sein, sagt Rachel Reeves. - This is a more formal and grammatically correct version.)

Der entlassene ehemalige Abgeordnete Jared O'Mara soll nie als Labour-Kandidat ausgewählt worden sein und verdient seine vierjährige Haftstrafe, sagte die Schattenschatzkanzlerin Rachel Reeves dem Guardian am Freitag in der Bolton North East-Wahlkreisstätte. Stunde für Stunde nachdem wichtige Persönlichkeiten der lokalen Partei zurücktraten, protestierten gegen die Kontrolle des parlamentarischen Auswahlverfahrens für die nächsten Wahlen durch das Labour-Nationale Exekutivkomitee (NEC) der Nationalen Exekutivkommission von Labour.

Translation:
The disgraced former MP Jared O'Mara "should never have been chosen as a Labour candidate" and deserves his four-year prison sentence, said the shadow chancellor Rachel Reeves to the Guardian on Friday in the Bolton North East constituency. Hours later, key figures in the local party resigned in protest against the control of the parliamentary selection process for the next general election by Labour's national executive committee (NEC).

Das gesamte Auswahlgremium in Bolton North East trat zurück, nachdem sie nicht zulässig auf die Vorauswahl entscheiden durften, was in der Labour-Partei unter Führung von Keir Starmer häufiger Praxis wird. Sie fügten hinzu: "Es scheint yet again, dass die Labour-Partei die Ansichten und Einstellungen einer Londoner Clique bevorzugt, statt den Mitgliedern im Norden. Das stimmt nicht mit der notwendigen Einstellung überein, um die Roten Mauer wieder zurückzuerobern, was unbedingt notwendig ist, um eine labourregierende Regierung zu liefern." Reeves sagte: "Ich weiß nicht, was die Umstände in Bolton sind, was passiert ist, aber ich weiß, dass jene, die ausgewählt werden, starke Kandidaten sind, oft mit sehr starken Wurzeln in ihren Gemeinschaften."

Translation: The entire selection committee in Bolton North East resigned because they were not allowed to make the shortlist, a practice that is increasingly common in Keir Starmer's Labour party. They added: "Once again, it seems that the Labour party is promoting the views and attitudes of a London clique, rather than local members in the north." They continued: "This goes against the necessary attitude to win back the red wall, which is so desperately needed to deliver a Labour government." Reeves said: "I don't know what the circumstances are in Bolton, but I do know that those being selected are strong candidates, often with very strong community roots."

Es gab besondere Unzufriedenheit darüber, dass Leigh Drennan, Vorsitzende von Labour North West und persönliche Assistentin des Jeremy Corbyn-unterstützenden Abgeordneten Charlotte Nichols aus Warrington North, nicht auf die Langliste gesetzt wurde, um den Sitz den Konservativen wieder abzujahnen, trotz der Nominierungen von vier großen Gewerkschaften. Reeves sagte, sie habe nichts mit der Kandidatenauswahl zu tun, fügte jedoch hinzu: "Ich weiß aber sehr wohl, dass es sehr wichtig ist, rigorose Verfahren für die Aufstellung der Langliste und der Kurzliste zu haben."

Translation:
There was particular dissatisfaction that Leigh Drennan, chair of Labour North West and aide to the Jeremy Corbyn-supporting Warrington North MP Charlotte Nichols, was not put on the longlist to try to regain the seat from the Conservatives, despite nominations from four large trade unions. Reeves stated that she had nothing to do with candidate selection but added: "I know very well that it's really important to have rigorous processes for those who can be longlisted and shortlisted."

O'Mara saß in Haft vier Jahre dieser Woche, nachdem eine Jury feststellte, dass er insgesamt £52.000 an falsch angegebenen Ausgaben vorgelegt hatte, um seine Kokain- und Alkoholabhängigkeit zu finanzieren. Viele Leute schlugen vor, er hätte von der Labour-Partei nicht ausreichend überprüft worden sein, als er 2017 gegen Nick Clegg, den ehemaligen liberalen Demokraten stellvertretenden Premierminister, im Snap-Wahlkreis Sheffield Hallam antrat. Reeves sagte, wenn das Vorfall von O'Mara in den Sinn der Labour-NEC kam: "Ich will in keiner Weise suggerieren, dass jeder, der nicht auf der Shortlist steht, Kokain benutzt. Aber Jared O'Mara war ein schreckliches Beispiel. Er hätte niemals als Labour-Kandidat kandidieren dürfen; er hätte niemals Abgeordneter geworden. Er hat öffentliches Geld verwendet, es ist ganz berechtigt, dass er seine Strafe erhalten hat."

Translation:
O'Mara was imprisoned for four years this week after a jury found that he had submitted false expense claims totaling £52,000 in an attempt to fund his cocaine and alcohol addiction. Many people suggested that he had not been properly vetted by Labour when he was selected to run against Nick Clegg, the former Liberal Democrat deputy prime minister, in Sheffield Hallam in the 2017 snap election. Reeves said, regarding the O'Mara scandal: "I don't want to imply in any way that anyone not on the shortlist is a cocaine user. But Jared O'Mara was a terrible example. He should never have been selected as a Labour candidate; he should never have been an MP. He used public money, it's absolutely right he's received his sentence."

Die Umstände O'Mara waren "ziemlich aussergewöhnlich", sagte Reeves, aber sie erkannte an: "Es gibt wichtige Lernungen für die Labour-Partei und alle politischen Parteien bei der Kandidatenauswahl zu ziehen. Reeves war in Bolton, um Lehrlinge bei einem Ausbildungszentrum für Openreach, dem Anbieter des breitbandigen Netzes im Vereinigten Königreich, zu treffen. Nachdem er sich Apprentices ansehen ließ, wie sie an Scheinpflöcken des £1,7m-Standorts hinaufkletterten, diskutierte Reeves die Pläne der Labour-Partei, die Apprenticeship-Steuer umzugestalten, die größeren Unternehmen verpflichtet, 0,5% ihres Lohnausgaben zu reservieren, um Lehrlinge zu finanzieren.

Translation note: In this translation, I assumed that "Reeves" is a proper name, and "Openreach" is a well-known company name in the UK. Reeves sagte, dass die Labour-Partei die Lehrabgabe ändern würde, damit Unternehmen die Gelder verwenden können, um Angestellte in Branchen wie dem Automobilsektor und jenen, die derzeit Gasheizkessel anbieten, in den Berufen auszubilden, in denen sie für die Energiewende auf Null Emissionen die notwendigen Fähigkeiten erlernen. "Wir müssen sie als Teil der Energiewende zur Null-Emission als Teil des Elektrofahrzeugsektors oder für die Anlage von Wärmepumpen oder Wasserstoffheizern ausbilden wollen. Wir wollen diese Menschen umschulen, um die Fähigkeiten zu erlangen, um erfolgreich zu sein. Und doch ist die Lehrabgabe gegen sie aufgestellt. Unternehmen fordern mehr Flexibilität und junge Menschen, die neu anfangen, oder ältere Menschen, die umschulen wollen, um sicherzustellen, dass ihre Fähigkeiten für die Zukunft relevant sind." sagte Reeves.

Translation: Businesses criticize the levy for being too inflexible. For example, Reeves said: Openreach wants to retrain people who work with copper to work with fiber, but the apprenticeship levy does not have the flexibility for retraining. Reeves said that Labour would change the levy so that companies could use the money to train employees in industries such as the automotive sector and those currently fitting gas boilers. "We want to train them as part of the energy transition to net zero to learn the skills to work on electric vehicles or install heat pumps or hydrogen boilers. We want these people to be retrained to acquire the skills they need to succeed. And yet the apprenticeship levy is working against them. Businesses demand more flexibility and young people starting out in life or older people who want to retrain to ensure that their skills are relevant for the future," said Reeves.

Eine Person verhaftet bei Protest gegen Kinderevent in Tate Britain mit Drag Queens

(Note: "Drag Queen" can be translated as "Dragqueen" or "Drag-Queen" in German, but I used "Dragqueens" here for consistency with the English original.)

Ein Person wurde verhaftet, während eine Protestveranstaltung vor Tate Britain stattfand, wo ein Kindermodul mit Drag Queens im Tate Britain stattgefunden hat. Die Metropolitan Polizei gab bekannt, dass eine Person wegen rassistischer Beleidigung gegenüber einem Polizisten außerhalb des Kunstgaleriemuseums nahe Westminster verhaftet wurde. Keine Verletzungen sind gemeldet und Polizisten bleiben auf der Spur, sagte die Polizei.

Translation note: "rasistischer Beleidigung" means "racially aggravated comment" or "racially aggravated abuse" in this context.

Das Tate veranstaltete am Samstag Drag Queen Story Stunde UK mit Erzählungen von Aida H Dee, die auf der Galeriewebseite als "erste Drag-Künstlerin in Europa" beschrieben wird, die Geschichten Kindern in einem Kindergarten erzählte. Rechtsgerichtete Protestierende demonstrierten außen vor der Galerie und wurden von Gegenprotestern angeführt, unter anderem von Transrechtsaktivisten und politischen Gruppen wie "Aufstehen gegen Rassismus". Die Beamten mussten eine Gang bilden, um Besuchern den Zugang zum Ort zu ermöglichen.

Translation:
The Tate was hosting Drag Queen Story Hour UK on Saturday, with stories told by Aida H Dee, described on the gallery's website as the first drag artist in Europe to read stories to children in a nursery. Right-wing protesters demonstrated outside the gallery and were led by counterprotesters, including trans-rights activists and political groups like "Stand Up to Racism". Officers formed a corridor to allow attendees to enter the venue.

Zum Schreiben auf Twitter sagte die Drag Queen, dass der Tag "echt emotional" gewesen sei. Drei Demonstranten waren in das Tate Museum eingedrungen und haben in Teilen des Gebäudes eine Störung verursacht, aber die Veranstaltung "Drag Story Hour UK" blieb unberührt. Sie hatte dem Pink News vorher gesagt, die Einladung zum Tate für das Event während des Monats der LGBTQ+-Geschichte sei "eine Ehre" gewesen. Ihre Lesungen waren bereits von Protesten betroffen. Die Drag Queen hatte gesagt, "Risikobewertungen" hätten stattgefunden - aber fühlte sie sich "lachhaft" darüber, dass sie notwendig waren. Aida schrieb: "5 Hasser sind ins Tate gelangt. Sie störten. ABER nicht bei Drag Story Hour UK ...Sie machten auf anderen Teilen des Gebäudes Fuss aufgepaßt, nicht dort, wo die Show stattfand!! Das zweite Show ging sehr gut!!!" Aida hatte drei Erzählungenssitzungen am Samstag um 11 Uhr, 12 Uhr und 2 Uhr geplant. Sprecher des Tate: "Wir programmieren Künstler nicht, um bestimmte Meinungen zu befördern oder unterschiedliche Meinungen auszugleichen." Unser Museum bietet eine breite Veranstaltungsreihe und Besucher können sich frei darüber auskennen, was sie mitmachen wollen."

(Note: This is a direct translation, please note that the term "Lender Watch" does not have a direct equivalent in German, so I translated it as "Kreditaufsicht" which means "credit supervision" or "credit watch.")

Donald Trumps schwer hypothékierte Wolkenkratzer an 40 Wall Street befindet sich auf "Kreditor-Beobachtung" wegen sinkender Einkünfte und steigender Kosten, gemeldet hat Bloomberg freitags. Wagner-Eigner sagt aus, dass der Krieg in der Ukraine Jahre andauern wird.

Februar in die Ukraine einmarschiert sind.

Translation: Prigozhin's statement, a billionaire with close ties to Russian President Vladimir Putin and known as "Putin's chef" due to lucrative Kremlin catering contracts, marked a recognition of the challenges the Kremlin has faced in the campaign, which it initially expected to wrap up within weeks when Russian troops invaded Ukraine on February 24.

Russland erlitt in der Herbstperiode eine Reihe von schämtlichen Rückschlägen, als die ukrainische Armee erfolgreiche Gegenoffensiven startete, um weite Gebiete im Osten und im Süden zurückzuerobern. Das Kreml hat Vorhersagen über die Dauer der Kämpfe gemavasst und erklärt, dass die sogenannte "spezielle militärische Operation" bis zu Erfüllung der Ziele andauern werde. Die russischen Truppen konzentrierten sich auf die Luhansk und Donetsk-Provinzen, die das Donbas-Gebiet ausmachen, in dem seit 2014 separatistisch geprägte Kräfte gegen ukrainische Truppen gekämpft haben.

Prigozhin bestätigte, dass die Kämpfer der Wagner-Gruppe weiter heftige Kämpfe um die ukrainische Festung Bakhmut in der Oblast Donetsk führten. Während russische Truppen ihre Angriffe in der Donbass-Region intensiviert haben, suchte Moskau zudem die Morale der Ukrainer durch die Abschaltung von Wärme und Wasser in den bitteren Winter zu brechen.

Der militärische Führer der Ukraine, Gen.
